AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: Now you can install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

AppPush.Title: You are using Preview build
AppPush.Message: You're using preview build and might be unstable. To report any issues, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/issues

RegionPush.Title: Announcement Regarding to Hi3Mirror Services Shutdown (2nd Time)
RegionPush.Message:
We would like to announce you that regarding to Hi3Mirror Services Shutdown, some features like Cross-version Conversion, Steam to Global Version Conversion, Game Data Repair and Caches Update would be unusable and causing the launcher to crash. For now, we are just hoping that the services could be back again on July 21st, 2022. At this moment, we really thank to you so much for your support to give this project a try. I hope we could reduce this kind of interruption in the future.

Sincerely,
neon-nyan

RegionPush.Title: Important Announcement Regarding to Genshin 2.8 Update Issue
RegionPush.Message: We would like to announce you that due to changes on Genshin's Dispatcher data structure, We have published 1.0.33.3-Hotfix build for both Stable and Preview channel to fix update failure issue for Genshin (at least for now). Thank you for your attention and apologize for the inconvenience.

RegionPush.Title: Update: Important Announcement Regarding to Genshin 2.8 Update Issue
RegionPush.Message: We would like to announce some good news for you. We finally figured out how to read the dispatcher data of the latest Genshin 2.8 update. Yep, you heard it right!. That means, the Pre-Install Verification process and Repair Game feature would be back soon. Also, we will add a support for these features on 原神 [Mainland China's Genshin Client] So, stay tune for the next follow-up news!
